markdownRemark.html:
Hi Friends üëã,

Welcome To aGuideHub!

To create mui typography as link in React js, you can use this code <Link href="#">. It will create mui typography as link in react js.

Today, I am going to show you, how to create mui typography as link in react js.

Installation

Install the following packages to use mui typography in react js.

npm

npm install @mui/material @emotion/react @emotion/styled

yarn

yarn add @mui/material @emotion/react @emotion/styled

Table of contents

  • Install MUI and create a new React app.
  • Import Material-UI Typography.
  • Create a Link Component.

Step 1: Install MUI and create a new React app.

First you have to install the React project. You should use create-react-app command to create a new React project.

npx create-react-app my-app
cd my-app
npm start

Step 2: Import Material-UI Typography.

After installing MUI, you have to import your React component. To do this, add the following line to the top of your component file.

import { Link, Typography } from '@mui/material';

Step 3: Create a Link Component.

You can use the Typography component in your react js. For example, The typography component is used to create text and the link component is used to create hyperlinks.

<Typography>
   This is a <Link href="#">link</Link> using Material-UI typography.
</Typography>

MUI material create mui typography as link example.

The below code is an example, you have to give links in Typography, then you have to import Typography Component and Links component. The typography component is used to create text and the link component is used to create hyperlinks.

App.js

import { Link, Typography } from '@mui/material';

export default function App() {
  return (
    <Typography>
      This is a <Link href="#">link</Link> using Material-UI typography.
    </Typography>
  );
}

In the above code example, I have used the @mui/material component and created mui typography as link in react js.

Check the output of the above code example.

Here, we are provided code sandbox links for the above program create mui typography as link in react js. Then you can use whenever you want and do the changes as per your requirements.

Try it Yourself

All the best üëç
